About Us

About Us









We are committed to providing high-quality, stylish apparel at great prices. Our family-oriented approach emphasizes core values like quality, customer satisfaction, and offering a vast selection from over 600 brands. Rigorous quality checks ensure only the best items make it to you. Should any issues arise, we provide dedicated support to resolve them promptly. Enjoy our top discounts and free shipping on a wide range of products, from womenâs fashion to childrenâs wear. Shop now for the best in style and savings.







Returns







We want your shopping experience to be nothing short of delightful! If, for any reason, youâre not completely satisfied with your purchase, worry not â we're here to help. We gladly accept returns, with just a few exceptions: items such as lots, swimwear, intimate bottoms, health, beauty, fragrance items, and perishables. To ensure a smooth return process, please make sure the item(s) are returned in their original condition within 30 days, complete with original tags and packaging. Regrettably, we canât process returns for items showing signs of wear, heavy perfumes, or exposure to smoke. Please note that intimate apparel bottoms, including panties and swimwear bottoms, are non-returnable. Your refund will cover the cost of the merchandise, minus any shipping costs incurred.


Initiating a return is a breeze â simply navigate through your eBay order. If you have any queries or need assistance with the return process, don't hesitate to reach out to our dedicated Customer Service team.



Curious about when your refund will hit your account?
 Once we receive your package, we'll swing into action, processing the return within just 2 business days. Your refund will reflect the purchase price, minus shipping costs, and will be credited back to your original form of payment.



Concerned about returning an item after the 30-day window?
 Unfortunately, we're unable to accept returns beyond this timeframe. Feel free to refer to eBayâs return policy to determine if your item qualifies for return.





Shipping







In the realm of online orders, your inbox serves as the gateway to your adventure. Upon shipment, expect a prompt email confirmation to arrive at the address linked to your eBay account, containing comprehensive tracking details. Should this confirmation fail to manifest, our dedicated customer service team stands ready to provide swift assistance at your request.


Navigating the waters of shipping, we offer a reliable timeframe of 3-4 business days for delivery, tailored to your items and their intended destination. Whether dispatched via UPS ground or USPS, rest assured, we prioritize efficiency and accuracy in all our shipments.


To expedite the dispatch process, orders placed before 2 pm Pacific Standard Time on weekdays will be shipped on the same day. However, please note that weekends and holidays may incur a slight delay, as we prioritize operational efficiency during standard business hours.


Rest assured, our commitment to timely and seamless delivery remains unwavering. Your satisfaction is our top priority as we navigate the intricacies of shipping with precision and professionalism.





Payment








What forms of payment are accepted?
 All payments are facilitated through eBay managed payments. For inquiries regarding accepted payment methods, please reach out to eBay Support.



How can I complete my payment?
 To make a payment, simply click the "Pay Now" button located at the top of the eBay item page to securely proceed through checkout.





Interested in saving on shipping costs for multiple items?
 If you intend to purchase multiple items to benefit from combined shipping, please refrain from making payment until all desired items are selected. It's essential that all items are acquired under the same user I.D. If you are consolidating purchases for combined shipping, ensure that all items are checked out simultaneously with a single payment.





Guidance for paying for multiple items:
 Begin by adding the desired items to your cart. Then, select "Pay Now" for each item you wish to purchase. Choose the option to combine shipping for each applicable item, and proceed by clicking "Continue". Utilize eBay's Checkout System to complete the checkout process.





What are the combined shipping rates for additional items?
 Both domestically and internationally, the initial item in your order, or the item with the highest shipping rate, will incur full shipping charges. Subsequent items will be shipped at a discounted rate, as





Support







We value your feedback and are committed to providing personalized attention to our customers. Our priority is to ensure your satisfaction by offering competitive pricing and striving to earn a 5-star rating from you every day. Your continued support is essential to us, and we welcome any questions, suggestions, or simply a chat. Don't forget to consult our FAQ section for additional assistance.


Our dedicated Customer Service team is available:


Monday - Friday

9am - 4:00pm PST

INFORMATION
SHIPPING
1. WE SHIP WORLDWIDE.
All orders are shipped from the state of California, USA. USPS First-Class Mail International is the cheapest shipping option available but these packages cannot be tracked or traced after we have mailed them. We will provide you with a Customs Declaration Number after the package was mailed which may help you to identify your shipment at your local post office in your country. Contact your local post office or Customs for more details. According to some of our international customers, some packages may take up to 30 days to be delivered. If you prefer to use USPS Priority Mail International instead and the option is not listed, please contact us for an updated quote on the shipping charges.
WE COMBINE SHIPPING. We may combine shipping and handling for multiple items based on weight. We will gladly give you an updated quote before your purchase. Contact us to provide the list of items you want to combine and the full address to get a shipping quote. If you purchase multiple items, please hold on your payment until you receive a consolidated invoice with the adjusted total amount. We will send you an invoice as soon as we can. 
2. We ship in 1~3 business days upon receipt of your payment and most packages usually takes 7 to 14 business days to arrive at destination. IMPORTANT NOTE: Your package may be subject to import duties, taxes, and/or customs fees which may be imposed by your local government before the package can be cleared from Customs. You are fully responsible for any of these additional charges. Please contact your local post office and/or customs office to inquire about these charges before placing your order.
 
Import Duty & Sales Tax
 
1. Import duties, taxes, and charges are not included in the item price or shipping charges. These charges are the buyer's responsibility. Please check with your country's customs office to determine what these additional costs will be prior to bidding/buying. 
2. These charges are normally collected by the delivering shipping company or when you pickup the item - Do not confuse them for additional shipping charges. 
3. We do not mark merchandise values below value or mark items as "gifts". US and International government regulations prohibit and does not tolerate such business practices. 
4. State laws require sales tax to be collected on all orders shipped to addresses within the state of California.
PAYMENT
1. We only accept PayPalÂ¢Ã¢ on eBayÂ¢Ã§. 
2. After you won an auction or purchased an item(s) from us, you will have 4 days to be able to combine items for consolidated shipping. When you are ready to checkout, request a combined invoice from us so you may pay all you items in one combined single payment. 
IMPORTANT: DO NOT pay your items separately. Doing it so will cause delays and your shipment may be sent in separate packages and you will not get the discounts for combined shipping & handling or any other promotional offers. Remember, if you have any questions, concerns, or comments please do not hesitate to contact one of our friendly Customer Service representatives via the 
eBayÂ¢Ã§ Messaging System
.
 
RETURNS
We want our customers to feel safe knowing they can return their item(s), no questions asked! If you are not happy with your item(s) for and reason, simply follow these 3 easy steps! 
1. Send us Message via 
eBayÂ¢Ã§ Messaging System
 to get the return mailing address. 
2. Write down "ETURN" clearly on the envelope or box and send the item(s) back to the address provided. 
3. Once the return is received, buyers will be contacted to arrange the refunds for the original purchased amount. Please note that postage is NON-REFUNDABLE. Refunds are for product(s) only. Original shipping fees will be deducted and are NON-REFUNDABLE. Buyers are responsible for postage fees both ways. 
4. All returns must be postmarked within 7 days of receipt of your package. 
5. If any item is damaged, we must be contacted within 24 hours of receipt of your package. We will not accept any item(s) that has been previously worn or with odors such as perfume, smoke, etc.
6. All original tags must be attached with no signs of wear.
RETURN LIMITATIONS
Jewelry, Cosmetics and FINAL SALE (30% off or higher sale) merchandise

TheMOGAN reserves the right to reject returns sent or communicated beyond the return period limit, or items which are not in the same condition in which they were received.

Fast + Effective Relief* Homeopathic Formulated for Those Who Live Actively Fast Acting Non-Habit Forming No Known Drug Interactions When leg or foot cramps seize you up, get fast, real relief with these flavorless, quick-dissolving tablets. No water required. No stomach discomfort. For the relief you need, when you need it, to get back on your feet. Uses: Helps temporarily relieve symptoms of: stiffness, pain in limbs, joints or legs, cramps in calves, feet or legs. *Claims based on traditional homeopathic practice, not accepted medical evidence. Not FDA evaluated.


SUGGESTED USE:


Use as directed.Â 
Adults and children 12 years and over:Â  Dissolve 2-3 tablets under tongue every 4 hours as needed. If the initial dosage is not providing immediate relief, dissolve 2-3 tablets under tongue every 15 minutes until relieved, up to 6 doses.Â 
Children under 12 years of age: ask a doctor before use.

Drug Facts
Active ingredients
Purpose
Aconitum Napellus 6X HPUS
pain in joints and legs
Cinchona Officinalis 3X HPUS
pain in limbs and joints, cramping in legs

cramps in calves and feet
Ledum Palustre 6X HPUS
pain and cramps in legs

muscle cramps

pain and stiffness

pain in joints

 acacia gum, lactose.
"HPUS" is the Homeopathic Pharmacopeia of the United States.


WARNINGS:


Ask doctor before use if you are sensitive to quinine.
Stop use and ask doctor if symptoms persist for more than 7 days or worsen.Â 
If pregnant or breastfeeding, ask a health professional before use.Â 
Keep out of reach of children.

About Us


 Welcome, and thank you for visiting Boolavard at eBay! 



 Today Boolavard carry thousands of clothing items and accessories . . . all year round!



 Of course, with great products comes great responsibility . . . especially to our many customers throughout the world. Our mission is to provide you--our valued customers--with exceptional service, unbeatable prices, and we hope one of the all around best experiences you've ever had shopping online. 



 Purchasing from us at eBay, you will get the same great service we are known for worldwide.  



 So please check out our selection of thousands of clothing items, accessories and supplies. And if you can't find what you are looking for, email us . . . one of our friendly and knowledge customer support representatives will be happy to help. 



 THANK YOU, and we look forward to SERVING YOU! 








Payment






Payment


 We accept all major credit / debit cards. 



 All transactions are managed via the secure payment system Paypal. 








Shipping






Shipping


 Boolavard is busy making every effort to ensure that orders are shipped as quickly as possible. We aim to send all orders received before 1pm from Monday to Friday the same day. This is not always possible at peak times. Please allow 1-2 business days for shipping when ordering. Orders are not sent on weekends. 




 
 Change your delivery address 
 



 You can specify a delivery address when placing your order. If you need to change this, please contact us as soon as possible after your order. Unfortunately, when your order is picked and packed, we can not change the delivery address. 





 
 FAILED DELIVERIES 
 



 Please note that when we receive a returned delivery from the customer, this will be refunded automatically. 





 
 ADDITIONAL HELP 
 



 If you have questions about the services we offer or wish to place your order, please do not hesitate to contact us. 








Terms






Terms


 All items are sold as described. 


 If you are not satisfied with your purchase please notify us within 28 days of receipt. 


 All unwanted items must be returned fully in a resaleable condition at the expense of the buyer. 


 For a defective or defective item, please contact us for a replacement. 








Returns






Returns


 We reserve the right to refuse the exchange or refund of any items that are not returned within 28 days of delivery. 



 In order to qualify for our Refund Policy, all items must be in a resaleable condition, for example, Intact, still in their original packaging, unworn and still with all tags and labels. 



 For all returned items we can arrange a refund or exchange. 



 Our reimbursement policies are complementary to these. 



 EXPLANATORY MEMORANDUM OF THE REFUND POLICY 



 There are exceptions to our refund policy for every item. Please note that this list does not affect non-excludable rights. 



 For health and hygiene reasons, we may not exchange or refund the following products if they are worn or if the packaging has been opened or damaged, unless the items are of inadequate quality or not suitable for the purpose: 



 Cosmetics. 


 Underwear and shapewear. 


 Swimwear

 Jewelry.

About Us


We offer brand new designer goods from major manufacturers and upscale department stores at a fraction of retail. We work directly with some of the largest retailers in the world to bring you the name brands that are famous for their quality and style. We guarantee all items are authentic or your money back!

Walk Into Fashion started on eBay and will continue to offer the very best deals to customers. We list hundreds of new items daily and start most of our auctions at .99 cents with no reserve, so let the bidding begin! What sets us apart from other large auction houses is our customer service. Not only do we offer incredible pricing, but it is our desire to provide you with the best shopping experience  every day. We strive to make YOU, our customer, our number one priority. We want your continued business!








Payment






Payment


We accept Paypal. You may also use your Visa, Mastercard, American Express, or Discover card through Paypal.

When you are ready to pay, Simply click the "Pay Now" button at the top of the eBay item page to submit a secure payment through checkout.

If you plan to purchase multiple items to save on combined shipping, DO NOT PAY until all items are purchased. We offer 7 days to combine all of your items into one checkout with one low shipping cost! Items must be purchased using the same user I.D. If you are buying multiple items to save on COMBINED SHIPPING, the auctions should end within 7 days of each other and must be checked out at the same time, with ONE payment.








Shipping






Shipping


Depending on the item(s) you purchase and the location to which the items will be delivered, different shipping methods are available. At checkout, you will be prompted to choose a shipping method. Shipping costs are based on the shipping method that you choose. Your total shipping charges will automatically compute during checkout prior to the completion of your order.

Generally, you will have the option to upgrade your shipping method for faster delivery (such as One-Day service). If you choose to upgrade your shipping method, your order must be received and clear credit authorization by 1:00 p.m. EST or your order will not be processed until the following business day. Business days are Monday-Friday, excluding federal holidays within the United States.









Returns






Returns


We take great pride in providing you with high quality and value. If you are dissatisfied with your purchase, we will assist you with a prompt refund or exchange. Our 100% guarantee ensures that every item you purchase from Walk Into Fashion meets your standards. If it does not meet your expectations, you may return it within 30 days with original receipt and all merchandise tags attached for a refund.

Please allow up to 10 business days for your return/refund to be processed. We will notify you via e-mail of your refund once we have received and processed the returned item. Shipping fees are not refundable.

Send your package via traceable method to ensure a safe and documented delivery to:

Walk Into Fashion
Returns Center
40A Cotters Lane
East Brunswick, NJ 08816

In the unlikely event that we have inadvertently sent you incorrect merchandise or you received damaged merchandise, please notify us immediately. We will reimburse you for the cost of returning the package to us, and we will not charge you for the shipping costs of replacement merchandise.

Elevate

About Us


 Welcome, and thank you for visiting Boolavard at eBay! 



 Today Boolavard carry thousands of clothing items and accessories . . . all year round!



 Of course, with great products comes great responsibility . . . especially to our many customers throughout the world. Our mission is to provide you--our valued customers--with exceptional service, unbeatable prices, and we hope one of the all around best experiences you've ever had shopping online. 



 Purchasing from us at eBay, you will get the same great service we are known for worldwide.  



 So please check out our selection of thousands of clothing items, accessories and supplies. And if you can't find what you are looking for, email us . . . one of our friendly and knowledge customer support representatives will be happy to help. 



 THANK YOU, and we look forward to SERVING YOU! 








Payment






Payment


 We accept all major credit / debit cards. 



 All transactions are managed via the secure payment system Paypal. 








Shipping






Shipping


 Boolavard is busy making every effort to ensure that orders are shipped as quickly as possible. We aim to send all orders received before 1pm from Monday to Friday the same day. This is not always possible at peak times. Please allow 1-2 business days for shipping when ordering. Orders are not sent on weekends. 




 
 Change your delivery address 
 



 You can specify a delivery address when placing your order. If you need to change this, please contact us as soon as possible after your order. Unfortunately, when your order is picked and packed, we can not change the delivery address. 





 
 FAILED DELIVERIES 
 



 Please note that when we receive a returned delivery from the customer, this will be refunded automatically. 





 
 ADDITIONAL HELP 
 



 If you have questions about the services we offer or wish to place your order, please do not hesitate to contact us. 








Terms






Terms


 All items are sold as described. 


 If you are not satisfied with your purchase please notify us within 28 days of receipt. 


 All unwanted items must be returned fully in a resaleable condition at the expense of the buyer. 


 For a defective or defective item, please contact us for a replacement. 








Returns






Returns


 We reserve the right to refuse the exchange or refund of any items that are not returned within 28 days of delivery. 



 In order to qualify for our Refund Policy, all items must be in a resaleable condition, for example, Intact, still in their original packaging, unworn and still with all tags and labels. 



 For all returned items we can arrange a refund or exchange. 



 Our reimbursement policies are complementary to these. 



 EXPLANATORY MEMORANDUM OF THE REFUND POLICY 



 There are exceptions to our refund policy for every item. Please note that this list does not affect non-excludable rights. 



 For health and hygiene reasons, we may not exchange or refund the following products if they are worn or if the packaging has been opened or damaged, unless the items are of inadequate quality or not suitable for the purpose: 



 Cosmetics. 


 Underwear and shapewear. 


 Swimwear 


 Studs. 


 Jewelry.

title: ["Nightmare Before Christmas Sally's Stitching Tights"]
contents:
eBay
 
 
Nightmare Before Christmas Sally's Stitching Tights
 
 
 
 
Officially licensed Nightmare Before Christmas Sally's Stitching Tights. These white "Nightmare Before Christmas" Tights are made from polyester and feature a classic "Sally's Stitching" design.
 
 
Most orders ship within 1 business day
Returns accepted within 30 days
 
 
 
 
 
Product FAQ
 
 
Are your items officially licensed?
 
Yes!  All of our brand-specific items are officially licensed, and the clothing is manufactured by professional silk/screen printers that hold the licenses for the brand.  These are not iron-on transfers. Please note that every vendor uses different garments, and the item may or may not still have the original garment label (for example, your Walking Dead shirt might simply be branded at the neck as Walking Dead, or it may still have an American Apparel tag.  This varies by vendor.)
 
Are your items brand new?  Do they have tags?
 
Yes! All items are brand new direct from our warehouse in Pennsylvania.  Note that your item may or may not come with paper tags.  Some manufacturers include them, some do not.  Some vendors remove neck tags in favor of printing tag information directly on the garment (tagless shirts - which are super comfy!)  Since we only sell online, we do not poke holes in the shirts to attach our own tags, either.  Your item is still brand new and licensed.
 
Do you have (this size) in stock?
 
Our currently available sizes are listed in the menu near the Buy button.  Our stock updates daily! 
 If there is no size selection, that means the item only comes in one standard size.
 
Do you have this item in another color?
 
Items are only available as shown in the photo.
 
 
 
 
Shipping Information
 
 
 
Do you combine shipping?
 
Yes, we combine shipping! Shop thousands of items in our store and combine your purchases for one low shipping rate (and note that most items ship FREE within the USA!)  Please purchase all items, or add them to your cart, BEFORE paying so eBay can combine the shipping for you.
 
When will my item arrive?
 
In-stock orders are typically processed and shipped within 1 business day.  Standard US mail averages 3-7 business days, while Expedited US mail averages 2-3 business days.  If you need your item by a certain date for an event or gift, we urge you to select Expedited Shipping.  eBay's shipping estimates for all methods are not guarantees and can be inaccurate, but selecting Expedited (USPS Priority Mail) has much better chance of arriving within 2-3 business days.
International shipping times are described below.
 
Do you ship internationally?
 
Yes! We ship worldwide to most countries.
 
How can I track my order?
 
USA customers:
 You will receive a USPS delivery confirmation number when your order ships. Note that this can take 48+ hours to update and sometimes, it will not update until delivery is made.
 
International Standard Mail:
 This service does NOT include tracking.  The number you will receive is customs form number. 
You will likely not be able to use this number to track your package.  If you require tracking, you may select Express service.
 Shipments usually take about 2 weeks to arrive, but customs in your country can often cause delays. 
It is not uncommon for international shipments to be delayed for days or weeks.  Please allow at least 8 weeks for delivery.
 
International Express:
 This service DOES have tracking and is the quickest, safest option. Shipments usually take 1-2 weeks to arrive.
 
 
 
 
Returns & Exchanges
 
 
What is your return policy?
 
We accept returns within 30 days.  You may initiate the return from your order page.  Please note that items must be returned in the original unworn, unwashed condition with all original tags if applicable.  Laundered clothing or used items can not be returned.  
 If you discover a damaged or incorrect item upon opening your package, we will be happy to assist- please contact us by sending a message with photo showing the issue before processing the return request through eBay, so we can work with your to resolve the issue. Thank you!
					
Can I exchange for another size or style?
 
If you would like to exchange your purchase, please return your original item for a refund, and place a new order ASAP for the item you need.  We do not have the means to perform exchanges through the eBay site, and this will also ensure that your selection does not sell out before your return is processed.
 
What if something is wrong with my order?
 
 If you discover a damaged or incorrect item upon opening your package, we will be happy to assist- please contact us by sending a message before processing the return request through eBay, so we can work with your to resolve the issue. Thank you!

About Us


ADIDAS SPORT:



						adidas SportÂ is mainly targeting competitive sports. The division's focus is primarily on innovation and technology. Target consumers range from sports participants at the highest level to those inspired by sport. Everything at adidas reflects the spirit of our founder Adi Dassler. His main objective back in those days already was to make athletes better, with innovation at the heart of all adidas SportÂ products. To underline our credibility as the multi-sport specialist and leverage brand strength, there is hardly any category that we don't produce products for. adidas is everywhere where the best meet the best, such as the FIFA World Cup, or the Olympic Games, but also everywhere else around the globe where sports are simply played, watched, enjoyed and celebrated.



						However, we are not just designing products for all kinds of sports. We are designing products for athletes. Athletes always strive for their personal best. Athletes find inspiration in sports no matter what they do. We help them to achieve their peak performance by making them faster, stronger, smarter and cooler.


ADIDAS ORIGINALS:



						No matter how serious you are about sports, a sporting lifestyle does not end in the locker room. This is why we have adidas Originals, our sub-brand that brings our iconic DNA from the courts to the streets. For well over a decade, it has been celebrating originality in a globally trendsetting way and, as the first brand leveraging its sports assets in the lifestyle area, it is regarded as a legitimate sports lifestyle brand. To ensure sustainable success, adidas Originals has to keep up to date with and set trends as well as remain committed to serving consumer groups who are constantly looking for more options to express their individuality.

For auction listings, payment is required within two (2) days of purchase. Any items not paid within two (2) days will risk the product being re-listed and sold to another buyer.
 
Policies
 
If you do need to return your item, please contact us via phone or email (you will receive an email when your product ships with additional details - Subject: Important information about your purchase from Bullseye Deals). You will then be provided with a return shipping label and packing slip. Pack the item carefully. Include the packing slip, apply the shipping label, and return the item within 5 business days of the date you request a return. You must return the item within 5 business days of requesting the return, or your return will be canceled. Once we receive your order we will inspect the return. Please allow up to 5 business days of receiving the returned item for your refund.

***International customers also please be aware that your shipment MAY take as long as 3 months to arrive. Please do not open up a case before enough time has passed. Many countries customs offices hold packages for weeks before the recipient is notified. You can cut that time down tremendously by contacting your customs office directly. This can save time and energy wasted on opening a case when there is no need to do so***
***FYI international buyers***I participate in the Global Shipping Program which means shipping costs are higher. If you do not wish to have your item shipped this way you MUST contact me prior to purchase so I can remove the global shipping option***

About Us


ADIDAS SPORT:



						adidas SportÂ is mainly targeting competitive sports. The division's focus is primarily on innovation and technology. Target consumers range from sports participants at the highest level to those inspired by sport. Everything at adidas reflects the spirit of our founder Adi Dassler. His main objective back in those days already was to make athletes better, with innovation at the heart of all adidas SportÂ products. To underline our credibility as the multi-sport specialist and leverage brand strength, there is hardly any category that we don't produce products for. adidas is everywhere where the best meet the best, such as the FIFA World Cup, or the Olympic Games, but also everywhere else around the globe where sports are simply played, watched, enjoyed and celebrated.



						However, we are not just designing products for all kinds of sports. We are designing products for athletes. Athletes always strive for their personal best. Athletes find inspiration in sports no matter what they do. We help them to achieve their peak performance by making them faster, stronger, smarter and cooler.


ADIDAS ORIGINALS:



						No matter how serious you are about sports, a sporting lifestyle does not end in the locker room. This is why we have adidas Originals, our sub-brand that brings our iconic DNA from the courts to the streets. For well over a decade, it has been celebrating originality in a globally trendsetting way and, as the first brand leveraging its sports assets in the lifestyle area, it is regarded as a legitimate sports lifestyle brand. To ensure sustainable success, adidas Originals has to keep up to date with and set trends as well as remain committed to serving consumer groups who are constantly looking for more options to express their individuality.

Love My Fashions are a family run business with many years of experience in the clothing trade. 
    Weâre a leading retailer, supplying the lowest prices for the best quality items on the e-commerce market.



    A UK based company, located in Birmingham and Manchester; we import from China, Italy and Pakistan, India and Bangladesh. We source the best products from around the world.



    Womenâs, Menâs and Kidâs high fashion made in Italy lagenlook plus size clothing. Which Include: Tops, dresses, jumpers, coats, jackets, lingerie, boxer shorts, bras, knickers, shapewear, tracksuits, kimonos, cardigans, jumpsuits, bandeaus, playsuits, jeans, leggings, trousers, jeggings, knitwear, onesies, hoodies and sweatshirts, joggers and jogging bottoms. We supply products for all seasonal styles; spring, summer, autumn and winter. Including, plus size, chic, middle-age, casual, formal, party, smart, office, outing, beach fashions.



    We provide free and fast UK shipping and also low priced shipping in Europe including; Germany, France, Italy, Spain, USA and Australia and worldwide. We also provide a reliable click & collect service for your convenience. Our 30 days no quibble return policy provides 100% customer satisfaction guaranteed.



    Our goal is to bring our customers the best in high quality customer service within 24hours.


We only accept PayPal as a payment method on all our listings. 



Payment must be received within 3 days after you have committed to buy. Unpaid item disputes will be filed to eBay for non-paying bidders.










We offer Free UK Shipping on all products


We offer next day delivery service

We offer worldwide shipping at very low prices

We despatch your orders within 24 hours


1.	How much does delivery cost?




Please note, your courier shipping details will depend upon your order, item and location but as standard option we use:


Royal Mail First Class Standard


Royal Mail Tracked


Royal Mail Next Day




2.	Where do you deliver to?




We deliver to any address in the UK mainland, as well as internationally.


Delivery rates and delivery times may vary by country.




3.	Are there any UK or international addresses where delivery might take longer?




Yes, there are certain locations in the UK including, the Highlands, the Channel Islands. Remote areas both in the UK and internationally may take longer to deliver your order.




4.	How will I know when my order has been sent?




As soon as your order is despatched from our Warehouse you will be sent an email to confirm that it's on its way. Your item will usually be despatched within 24 hours.




5.	Once my order has been despatched when will I receive it?




The estimated delivery time for UK orders is 2-3 working days for deliveries within the UK or 3-7 working days for deliveries overseas. Deliveries are usually from Monday to Friday 9am to 5pm excluding public holidays, but this may be dependent upon your courier.


Please note: Whilst we make every effort to deliver goods in the time specified, we cannot guarantee delivery in that time period or accept liability for deliveries made outside of this timescale. We cannot accept liability for any out of pocket expenses or other costs incurred due to failed or delayed deliveries.


Royal Mail will not deem a parcel to be lost until it has been in the postal system for a period of 14 calendar days for orders within the UK and 21 calendar days for International orders. Although it is highly unlikely deliveries will take this amount of time we are unable to despatch a replacement or issue a refund until this period of time has elapsed. If you have not received your order within the estimated delivery time please check with your neighbours and your local sorting office.




6.	What do I do if I have not received my order?




Should your order not arrive within the estimated time (please see 'Once my order has been dispatched when will I receive it?') please contact us so that we can class the item as 'Lost In Post' and investigate with Royal Mail.


Please remember that we cannot investigate any missing orders until 14 calendar days have passed for UK deliveries and 21 calendar days for overseas deliveries.


We ask that you ensure you report any items not received within 40 days of dispatched as after this time we may not be able to replace or refund your item.




7.	One of the items is missing from my order. What do I do?




If an item is missing from your order please contact us immediately via eBay so we can resolve the issue for you and get the missing item despatched to you.




8.	What happens if I am not at home to accept my delivery?




In the event that you have ordered a product which will not fit through your letterbox, and you are not in to take delivery, then the postal service will follow their usual procedure. For UK orders this usually means a card is left to notify you of an attempted delivery and the item will either be left with neighbours or be held at your local sorting office.


For International orders please refer to your local postal company for their standard procedure in case this differs to the UK.




9.	The product has arrived faulty / damaged, what should I do?




We apologise for the inconvenience if we have delivered a faulty or damaged item. If the product you have ordered has arrived faulty or damaged, please contact us for a copy of our return form and further instructions.


Please note: Any orders returned to us which have not been authorised will not be refunded.




10.	I have been delivered the wrong product, what should I do?




We apologise for the inconvenience if we have delivered the wrong item. If the product you have received is not the one you ordered, please contact us for a copy of our return form and further instructions.


Please note: Any orders returned to us which have not been authorised will not be refunded.




11.	Severe Weather




Should there be any severe weather conditions, each day will be assessed as it comes and you will be emailed advising of what actions have been put in place and when you should expect to receive your order. Please be assured that in these circumstances, Love My Fashions will do everything possible to fulfil your order within the limitations that the weather brings.




12.	Am I able to change the delivery address to something other than my registered address?




For security reasons we are unable to deliver to any address other than your registered address.




13.	Do you deliver on Bank Holidays?




Bank Holidays are not classed as working days so we don't include these in our estimated delivery times. In this instance you should expect delivery on the next working day.




14.	Do you combine postage charges or send items together?




We do offer combined shipping on all orders. If our store does not calculate this automatically, please contact us so we can combine the costs for you manually and reimburse you immediately after your order.








1.	What is your return policy?




We want you to be happy with your purchase. However, if it is not suitable for any reason, we are happy to refund your purchase providing it is:


Returned within 30 days of receiving your order


It is in original undamaged packaging with all tags intact


The product is in the same condition as how you received it


You have a statutory duty to take reasonable care of our goods whilst they are in your possession and during transit. We cannot accept liability for goods that get lost or damaged when they are returned. We ask that you return items by second class post and please keep a copy of your receipt until you receive a confirmation email that we have received your item and have proceeded with a refund or an exchange for you


If the item you receive is faulty, damaged or the wrong item has been sent, please follow our returns instructions or contact our customer care team as soon as possible so they can advise you further.


With the exception of faulty or damaged goods, if you return your purchase after 30 days of receiving your order, we reserve the right to not offer you a full refund. We will instead refund you the original order price minus postage and packaging charges and a 20% restocking fee.


In the unlikely event of an item being received damaged or faulty you have 30 days from date of despatch to report this to us for Return.




2.	How do I return an item?




We want to ensure you are totally satisfied when shopping with us so, if you change your mind for any reason, you are able to report an unopened item to us for Return within 30 days of it being despatched to you.


In the unlikely event of an item being received damaged or faulty you have 30 days from date of despatch to report this to us for Return.


Unfortunately we are unable to supply a pre-paid returns envelope in any case and we ask that you arrange your own delivery.


To arrange a return please contact us via eBay and we will provide you with returns information. All you need to tell us is which item you wish to return and the reason why. You will need to package the item securely and include a completed copy of our returns form which we will issue you.




3.	When will I receive my refund/replacement?




We will process your refund / replacement as soon as your item is

This can save time and energy wasted on opening a case when there is no need to do so***
***FYI international buyers***I participate in the Global Shipping Program which means shipping costs are higher. If you do not wish to have your item shipped this way you MUST contact me prior to purchase so I can remove the global shipping option***

Our mission is to provide you--our valued customers--with exceptional service, unbeatable prices, and we hope one of the all around best experiences you've ever had shopping online. 



 Purchasing from us at eBay, you will get the same great service we are known for worldwide.

Shipping






Shipping


 Boolavard is busy making every effort to ensure that orders are shipped as quickly as possible. We aim to send all orders received before 1pm from Monday to Friday the same day. This is not always possible at peak times. Please allow 1-2 business days for shipping when ordering. Orders are not sent on weekends.

 ADDITIONAL HELP

 In order to qualify for our Refund Policy, all items must be in a resaleable condition, for example, Intact, still in their original packaging, unworn and still with all tags and labels. 



 For all returned items we can arrange a refund or exchange. 



 Our reimbursement policies are complementary to these. 



 EXPLANATORY MEMORANDUM OF THE REFUND POLICY 



 There are exceptions to our refund policy for every item. Please note that this list does not affect non-excludable rights. 



 For health and hygiene reasons, we may not exchange or refund the following products if they are worn or if the packaging has been opened or damaged, unless the items are of inadequate quality or not suitable for the purpose: 



 Cosmetics.

How to read the size chart?

The left-hand column usually shows the sizes available for ordering, for example, Small, Medium, Large, etc. The other columns to the right show the approximate equivalents based on your measurements.




What if I'm in between sizes?

If the size chart shows you're in between sizes, we recommend going with the larger size.




What does "One Size" or "Plus Size" mean?

These items are usually made with stretchable material and/or come with adjustable straps making them capable of fitting an array of body shapes and sizes. If you are at either end of the size ranges above, particularly at the upper end, then you may want to avoid the "one size" or "plus size" styles. How to read the size chart?

The left-hand column usually shows the sizes available for ordering, for example, Small, Medium, Large, etc. The other columns to the right show the approximate equivalents based on your measurements.




What if I'm in between sizes?

If the size chart shows you're in between sizes, we recommend going with the larger size.




What does "One Size" or "Plus Size" mean?

These items are usually made with stretchable material and/or come with adjustable straps making them capable of fitting an array of body shapes and sizes. If you are at either end of the size ranges above, particularly at the upper end, then you may want to avoid the "one size" or "plus size" styles. About Us


 Welcome, and thank you for visiting Boolavard at eBay! 



 Today Boolavard carry thousands of clothing items and accessories . . . all year round!



 Of course, with great products comes great responsibility . . . especially to our many customers throughout the world. Our mission is to provide you--our valued customers--with exceptional service, unbeatable prices, and we hope one of the all around best experiences you've ever had shopping online. 



 Purchasing from us at eBay, you will get the same great service we are known for worldwide.  



 So please check out our selection of thousands of clothing items, accessories and supplies. And if you can't find what you are looking for, email us . . . one of our friendly and knowledge customer support representatives will be happy to help. 



 THANK YOU, and we look forward to SERVING YOU! 








Payment






Payment


 We accept all major credit / debit cards. 



 All transactions are managed via the secure payment system Paypal. 








Shipping






Shipping


 Boolavard is busy making every effort to ensure that orders are shipped as quickly as possible. We aim to send all orders received before 1pm from Monday to Friday the same day. This is not always possible at peak times. Please allow 1-2 business days for shipping when ordering. Orders are not sent on weekends. 




 
 Change your delivery address 
 



 You can specify a delivery address when placing your order. If you need to change this, please contact us as soon as possible after your order. Unfortunately, when your order is picked and packed, we can not change the delivery address. 





 
 FAILED DELIVERIES 
 



 Please note that when we receive a returned delivery from the customer, this will be refunded automatically. 





 
 ADDITIONAL HELP 
 



 If you have questions about the services we offer or wish to place your order, please do not hesitate to contact us. 








Terms






Terms


 All items are sold as described. 


 If you are not satisfied with your purchase please notify us within 28 days of receipt. 


 All unwanted items must be returned fully in a resaleable condition at the expense of the buyer. 


 For a defective or defective item, please contact us for a replacement. 








Returns






Returns


 We reserve the right to refuse the exchange or refund of any items that are not returned within 28 days of delivery. 



 In order to qualify for our Refund Policy, all items must be in a resaleable condition, for example, Intact, still in their original packaging, unworn and still with all tags and labels. 



 For all returned items we can arrange a refund or exchange. 



 Our reimbursement policies are complementary to these. 



 EXPLANATORY MEMORANDUM OF THE REFUND POLICY 



 There are exceptions to our refund policy for every item. Please note that this list does not affect non-excludable rights. 



 For health and hygiene reasons, we may not exchange or refund the following products if they are worn or if the packaging has been opened or damaged, unless the items are of inadequate quality or not suitable for the purpose: 



 Cosmetics. 


 Underwear and shapewear. 


 Swimwear 


 Studs. 


 Jewelry.

title: ["Nightmare Before Christmas Sally's Stitching Tights"]
contents:
eBay
 
 
Nightmare Before Christmas Sally's Stitching Tights
 
 
 
 
Officially licensed Nightmare Before Christmas Sally's Stitching Tights. These white "Nightmare Before Christmas" Tights are made from polyester and feature a classic "Sally's Stitching" design.
 
 
Most orders ship within 1 business day
Returns accepted within 30 days
 
 
 
 
 
Product FAQ
 
 
Are your items officially licensed?
 
Yes!  All of our brand-specific items are officially licensed, and the clothing is manufactured by professional silk/screen printers that hold the licenses for the brand.  These are not iron-on transfers. Please note that every vendor uses different garments, and the item may or may not still have the original garment label (for example, your Walking Dead shirt might simply be branded at the neck as Walking Dead, or it may still have an American Apparel tag.  This varies by vendor.)
 
Are your items brand new?  Do they have tags?
 
Yes! All items are brand new direct from our warehouse in Pennsylvania.  Note that your item may or may not come with paper tags.  Some manufacturers include them, some do not.  Some vendors remove neck tags in favor of printing tag information directly on the garment (tagless shirts - which are super comfy!)  Since we only sell online, we do not poke holes in the shirts to attach our own tags, either.  Your item is still brand new and licensed.
 
Do you have (this size) in stock?
 
Our currently available sizes are listed in the menu near the Buy button.  Our stock updates daily! 
 If there is no size selection, that means the item only comes in one standard size.
 
Do you have this item in another color?
 
Items are only available as shown in the photo.
 
 
 
 
Shipping Information
 
 
 
Do you combine shipping?
 
Yes, we combine shipping! Shop thousands of items in our store and combine your purchases for one low shipping rate (and note that most items ship FREE within the USA!)  Please purchase all items, or add them to your cart, BEFORE paying so eBay can combine the shipping for you.
 
When will my item arrive?
 
In-stock orders are typically processed and shipped within 1 business day.  Standard US mail averages 3-7 business days, while Expedited US mail averages 2-3 business days.  If you need your item by a certain date for an event or gift, we urge you to select Expedited Shipping.  eBay's shipping estimates for all methods are not guarantees and can be inaccurate, but selecting Expedited (USPS Priority Mail) has much better chance of arriving within 2-3 business days.
International shipping times are described below.
 
Do you ship internationally?
 
Yes! We ship worldwide to most countries.
 
How can I track my order?
 
USA customers:
 You will receive a USPS delivery confirmation number when your order ships. Note that this can take 48+ hours to update and sometimes, it will not update until delivery is made.
 
International Standard Mail:
 This service does NOT include tracking.  The number you will receive is customs form number. 
You will likely not be able to use this number to track your package.  If you require tracking, you may select Express service.
 Shipments usually take about 2 weeks to arrive, but customs in your country can often cause delays. 
It is not uncommon for international shipments to be delayed for days or weeks.  Please allow at least 8 weeks for delivery.
 
International Express:
 This service DOES have tracking and is the quickest, safest option. Shipments usually take 1-2 weeks to arrive.
 
 
 
 
Returns & Exchanges
 
 
What is your return policy?
 
We accept returns within 30 days.  You may initiate the return from your order page.  Please note that items must be returned in the original unworn, unwashed condition with all original tags if applicable.  Laundered clothing or used items can not be returned.  
 If you discover a damaged or incorrect item upon opening your package, we will be happy to assist- please contact us by sending a message with photo showing the issue before processing the return request through eBay, so we can work with your to resolve the issue. Thank you!
					
Can I exchange for another size or style?
 
If you would like to exchange your purchase, please return your original item for a refund, and place a new order ASAP for the item you need.  We do not have the means to perform exchanges through the eBay site, and this will also ensure that your selection does not sell out before your return is processed.
 
What if something is wrong with my order?
 
 If you discover a damaged or incorrect item upon opening your package, we will be happy to assist- please contact us by sending a message before processing the return request through eBay, so we can work with your to resolve the issue. Thank you!

title: ["Nightmare Before Christmas Sally's Stitching Tights"]
contents:
eBay
 
 
Nightmare Before Christmas Sally's Stitching Tights
 
 
 
 
Officially licensed Nightmare Before Christmas Sally's Stitching Tights. These white "Nightmare Before Christmas" Tights are made from polyester and feature a classic "Sally's Stitching" design.
 
 
Most orders ship within 1 business day
Returns accepted within 30 days
 
 
 
 
 
Product FAQ
 
 
Are your items officially licensed?
 
Yes!  All of our brand-specific items are officially licensed, and the clothing is manufactured by professional silk/screen printers that hold the licenses for the brand.  These are not iron-on transfers. Please note that every vendor uses different garments, and the item may or may not still have the original garment label (for example, your Walking Dead shirt might simply be branded at the neck as Walking Dead, or it may still have an American Apparel tag.  This varies by vendor.)
 
Are your items brand new?  Do they have tags?
 
Yes! All items are brand new direct from our warehouse in Pennsylvania.  Note that your item may or may not come with paper tags.  Some manufacturers include them, some do not.  Some vendors remove neck tags in favor of printing tag information directly on the garment (tagless shirts - which are super comfy!)  Since we only sell online, we do not poke holes in the shirts to attach our own tags, either.  Your item is still brand new and licensed.
 
Do you have (this size) in stock?
 
Our currently available sizes are listed in the menu near the Buy button.  Our stock updates daily! 
 If there is no size selection, that means the item only comes in one standard size.
 
Do you have this item in another color?
 
Items are only available as shown in the photo.
 
 
 
 
Shipping Information
 
 
 
Do you combine shipping?
 
Yes, we combine shipping! Shop thousands of items in our store and combine your purchases for one low shipping rate (and note that most items ship FREE within the USA!)  Please purchase all items, or add them to your cart, BEFORE paying so eBay can combine the shipping for you.
 
When will my item arrive?
 
In-stock orders are typically processed and shipped within 1 business day.  Standard US mail averages 3-7 business days, while Expedited US mail averages 2-3 business days.  If you need your item by a certain date for an event or gift, we urge you to select Expedited Shipping.  eBay's shipping estimates for all methods are not guarantees and can be inaccurate, but selecting Expedited (USPS Priority Mail) has much better chance of arriving within 2-3 business days.
International shipping times are described below.
 
Do you ship internationally?
 
Yes! We ship worldwide to most countries.
 
How can I track my order?
 
USA customers:
 You will receive a USPS delivery confirmation number when your order ships. Note that this can take 48+ hours to update and sometimes, it will not update until delivery is made.
 
International Standard Mail:
 This service does NOT include tracking.  The number you will receive is customs form number. 
You will likely not be able to use this number to track your package.  If you require tracking, you may select Express service.
 Shipments usually take about 2 weeks to arrive, but customs in your country can often cause delays. 
It is not uncommon for international shipments to be delayed for days or weeks.  Please allow at least 8 weeks for delivery.
 
International Express:
 This service DOES have tracking and is the quickest, safest option. Shipments usually take 1-2 weeks to arrive.
 
 
 
 
Returns & Exchanges
 
 
What is your return policy?
 
We accept returns within 30 days.  You may initiate the return from your order page.  Please note that items must be returned in the original unworn, unwashed condition with all original tags if applicable.  Laundered clothing or used items can not be returned.  
 If you discover a damaged or incorrect item upon opening your package, we will be happy to assist- please contact us by sending a message with photo showing the issue before processing the return request through eBay, so we can work with your to resolve the issue. Thank you!
					
Can I exchange for another size or style?
 
If you would like to exchange your purchase, please return your original item for a refund, and place a new order ASAP for the item you need.  We do not have the means to perform exchanges through the eBay site, and this will also ensure that your selection does not sell out before your return is processed.
 
What if something is wrong with my order?
 
 If you discover a damaged or incorrect item upon opening your package, we will be happy to assist- please contact us by sending a message before processing the return request through eBay, so we can work with your to resolve the issue. Thank you!

Which Include: Tops, dresses, jumpers, coats, jackets, lingerie, boxer shorts, bras, knickers, shapewear, tracksuits, kimonos, cardigans, jumpsuits, bandeaus, playsuits, jeans, leggings, trousers, jeggings, knitwear, onesies, hoodies and sweatshirts, joggers and jogging bottoms. We supply products for all seasonal styles; spring, summer, autumn and winter. Including, plus size, chic, middle-age, casual, formal, party, smart, office, outing, beach fashions.



    We provide free and fast UK shipping and also low priced shipping in Europe including; Germany, France, Italy, Spain, USA and Australia and worldwide. We also provide a reliable click & collect service for your convenience. Our 30 days no quibble return policy provides 100% customer satisfaction guaranteed.

We only accept PayPal as a payment method on all our listings.

We offer Free UK Shipping on all products


We offer next day delivery service

We offer worldwide shipping at very low prices

We despatch your orders within 24 hours


1.	How much does delivery cost?




Please note, your courier shipping details will depend upon your order, item and location but as standard option we use:


Royal Mail First Class Standard


Royal Mail Tracked


Royal Mail Next Day




2.	Where do you deliver to?




We deliver to any address in the UK mainland, as well as internationally.


Delivery rates and delivery times may vary by country.




3.	Are there any UK or international addresses where delivery might take longer?




Yes, there are certain locations in the UK including, the Highlands, the Channel Islands. Remote areas both in the UK and internationally may take longer to deliver your order.




4.	How will I know when my order has been sent?




As soon as your order is despatched from our Warehouse you will be sent an email to confirm that it's on its way. Your item will usually be despatched within 24 hours.




5.	Once my order has been despatched when will I receive it?




The estimated delivery time for UK orders is 2-3 working days for deliveries within the UK or 3-7 working days for deliveries overseas. Deliveries are usually from Monday to Friday 9am to 5pm excluding public holidays, but this may be dependent upon your courier.


Please note: Whilst we make every effort to deliver goods in the time specified, we cannot guarantee delivery in that time period or accept liability for deliveries made outside of this timescale. We cannot accept liability for any out of pocket expenses or other costs incurred due to failed or delayed deliveries.


Royal Mail will not deem a parcel to be lost until it has been in the postal system for a period of 14 calendar days for orders within the UK and 21 calendar days for International orders. Although it is highly unlikely deliveries will take this amount of time we are unable to despatch a replacement or issue a refund until this period of time has elapsed. If you have not received your order within the estimated delivery time please check with your neighbours and your local sorting office.




6.	What do I do if I have not received my order?




Should your order not arrive within the estimated time (please see 'Once my order has been dispatched when will I receive it?') please contact us so that we can class the item as 'Lost In Post' and investigate with Royal Mail.


Please remember that we cannot investigate any missing orders until 14 calendar days have passed for UK deliveries and 21 calendar days for overseas deliveries.


We ask that you ensure you report any items not received within 40 days of dispatched as after this time we may not be able to replace or refund your item.




7.	One of the items is missing from my order. What do I do?




If an item is missing from your order please contact us immediately via eBay so we can resolve the issue for you and get the missing item despatched to you.




8.	What happens if I am not at home to accept my delivery?




In the event that you have ordered a product which will not fit through your letterbox, and you are not in to take delivery, then the postal service will follow their usual procedure. For UK orders this usually means a card is left to notify you of an attempted delivery and the item will either be left with neighbours or be held at your local sorting office.


For International orders please refer to your local postal company for their standard procedure in case this differs to the UK.




9.	The product has arrived faulty / damaged, what should I do?




We apologise for the inconvenience if we have delivered a faulty or damaged item. If the product you have ordered has arrived faulty or damaged, please contact us for a copy of our return form and further instructions.


Please note: Any orders returned to us which have not been authorised will not be refunded.




10.	I have been delivered the wrong product, what should I do?




We apologise for the inconvenience if we have delivered the wrong item. If the product you have received is not the one you ordered, please contact us for a copy of our return form and further instructions.


Please note: Any orders returned to us which have not been authorised will not be refunded.




11.	Severe Weather




Should there be any severe weather conditions, each day will be assessed as it comes and you will be emailed advising of what actions have been put in place and when you should expect to receive your order. Please be assured that in these circumstances, Love My Fashions will do everything possible to fulfil your order within the limitations that the weather brings.




12.	Am I able to change the delivery address to something other than my registered address?




For security reasons we are unable to deliver to any address other than your registered address.




13.	Do you deliver on Bank Holidays?




Bank Holidays are not classed as working days so we don't include these in our estimated delivery times. In this instance you should expect delivery on the next working day.




14.	Do you combine postage charges or send items together?




We do offer combined shipping on all orders. If our store does not calculate this automatically, please contact us so we can combine the costs for you manually and reimburse you immediately after your order.

We want you to be happy with your purchase. However, if it is not suitable for any reason, we are happy to refund your purchase providing it is:

The product is in the same condition as how you received it

In the unlikely event of an item being received damaged or faulty you have 30 days from date of despatch to report this to us for Return.




2.	How do I return an item?




We want to ensure you are totally satisfied when shopping with us so, if you change your mind for any reason, you are able to report an unopened item to us for Return within 30 days of it being despatched to you.


In the unlikely event of an item being received damaged or faulty you have 30 days from date of despatch to report this to us for Return.


Unfortunately we are unable to supply a pre-paid returns envelope in any case and we ask that you arrange your own delivery.


To arrange a return please contact us via eBay and we will provide you with returns information. All you need to tell us is which item you wish to return and the reason why. You will need to package the item securely and include a completed copy of our returns form which we will issue you.

question: I want leggings that are stretchy, plaid, and ultra-soft.
golden_answers: Plaid Ultra Soft Leggings | One Size | Plus Size | 3X-5X16
title: ["Nightmare Before Christmas Sally's Stitching Tights"]
contents:
eBay
 
 
Nightmare Before Christmas Sally's Stitching Tights
 
 
 
 
Officially licensed Nightmare Before Christmas Sally's Stitching Tights. These white "Nightmare Before Christmas" Tights are made from polyester and feature a classic "Sally's Stitching" design.
 
 
Most orders ship within 1 business day
Returns accepted within 30 days
 
 
 
 
 
Product FAQ
 
 
Are your items officially licensed?
 
Yes!  All of our brand-specific items are officially licensed, and the clothing is manufactured by professional silk/screen printers that hold the licenses for the brand.  These are not iron-on transfers. Please note that every vendor uses different garments, and the item may or may not still have the original garment label (for example, your Walking Dead shirt might simply be branded at the neck as Walking Dead, or it may still have an American Apparel tag.  This varies by vendor.)
 
Are your items brand new?  Do they have tags?
 
Yes! All items are brand new direct from our warehouse in Pennsylvania.  Note that your item may or may not come with paper tags.  Some manufacturers include them, some do not.  Some vendors remove neck tags in favor of printing tag information directly on the garment (tagless shirts - which are super comfy!)  Since we only sell online, we do not poke holes in the shirts to attach our own tags, either.  Your item is still brand new and licensed.
 
Do you have (this size) in stock?
 
Our currently available sizes are listed in the menu near the Buy button.  Our stock updates daily! 
 If there is no size selection, that means the item only comes in one standard size.
 
Do you have this item in another color?
 
Items are only available as shown in the photo.
 
 
 
 
Shipping Information
 
 
 
Do you combine shipping?
 
Yes, we combine shipping! Shop thousands of items in our store and combine your purchases for one low shipping rate (and note that most items ship FREE within the USA!)  Please purchase all items, or add them to your cart, BEFORE paying so eBay can combine the shipping for you.
 
When will my item arrive?
 
In-stock orders are typically processed and shipped within 1 business day.  Standard US mail averages 3-7 business days, while Expedited US mail averages 2-3 business days.  If you need your item by a certain date for an event or gift, we urge you to select Expedited Shipping.  eBay's shipping estimates for all methods are not guarantees and can be inaccurate, but selecting Expedited (USPS Priority Mail) has much better chance of arriving within 2-3 business days.
International shipping times are described below.
 
Do you ship internationally?
 
Yes! We ship worldwide to most countries.
 
How can I track my order?
 
USA customers:
 You will receive a USPS delivery confirmation number when your order ships. Note that this can take 48+ hours to update and sometimes, it will not update until delivery is made.
 
International Standard Mail:
 This service does NOT include tracking.  The number you will receive is customs form number. 
You will likely not be able to use this number to track your package.  If you require tracking, you may select Express service.
 Shipments usually take about 2 weeks to arrive, but customs in your country can often cause delays. 
It is not uncommon for international shipments to be delayed for days or weeks.  Please allow at least 8 weeks for delivery.
 
International Express:
 This service DOES have tracking and is the quickest, safest option. Shipments usually take 1-2 weeks to arrive.
 
 
 
 
Returns & Exchanges
 
 
What is your return policy?
 
We accept returns within 30 days.  You may initiate the return from your order page.  Please note that items must be returned in the original unworn, unwashed condition with all original tags if applicable.  Laundered clothing or used items can not be returned.  
 If you discover a damaged or incorrect item upon opening your package, we will be happy to assist- please contact us by sending a message with photo showing the issue before processing the return request through eBay, so we can work with your to resolve the issue. Thank you!
					
Can I exchange for another size or style?
 
If you would like to exchange your purchase, please return your original item for a refund, and place a new order ASAP for the item you need.  We do not have the means to perform exchanges through the eBay site, and this will also ensure that your selection does not sell out before your return is processed.
 
What if something is wrong with my order?
 
 If you discover a damaged or incorrect item upon opening your package, we will be happy to assist- please contact us by sending a message before processing the return request through eBay, so we can work with your to resolve the issue. Thank you!

Fabric Information


















Our Guarantee




You can buy with confidence because you are purchasing directly from Hanes! You can trust that your purchase will be the authentic, first quality Hanes merchandise you love, as sold in leading stores everywhere.

ABOUT US 





HanesBrands is a socially responsible manufacturer and marketer of leading everyday basic apparel under some of the world's strongest apparel brands in the Americas, Europe and Asia, as well as in Australia and South Africa. Our iconic innerwear and activewear apparel brands found in the United States and elsewhere include Hanes, Champion, Playtex, Bali, Maidenform, JMS/Just My Size, Wonderbra and Gear for Sports. Outside the United States, we also have dominant national and regional brands, including DIM, Nur Die/Nur Der, Lovable, Abanderado, Shock Absorber, Zorba, Sol y Oro, Rinbros, Track N Field and Ritmo.


We are the worldâs largest marketer of basic apparel. We sell bras, panties, shapewear, sheer hosiery, men's underwear, children's underwear, socks, T-shirts, sweatshirts, fleece and other activewear. In the United States, we sell more units of intimate apparel, male underwear, socks, shapewear, hosiery and T-shirts than any other company.


Founded in 1901, Hanes has a long history of innovation, product excellence, and brand recognition. In fact, nearly 90 percent of U.S. households have our company's products in them. We revolutionized Tagless T-shirts and underwear, we invented the sports bra and the stretch-cup T-shirt bra, we were the first to advertise a bra on national television (Playtex), and we are innovating with ComfortBlend and temperature-control X-Temp fabrics and seamless Smart Sizes bras.


Our Sell More, Spend Less and Make Acquisitions strategies are driving growth and creating value for our shareholders, consumers, retailers, employees and communities. Hanes has made more than a half dozen acquisitions, including Maidenform Brands, Gear for Sports and Knights Apparel in the United States and DBApparel in Europe.


Based in Winston-Salem, N.C., Hanes is a member of the S&P 500 and is ranked No. 490 on the Fortune 500 list. The company has approximately 65,300 employees in more than 40 countries.


Unlike most apparel companies, Hanes primarily operates its own manufacturing facilities. More than 90 percent of the apparel units that we sell worldwide and in the United States are manufactured in our own plants or those of dedicated contractors.


We take great pride in our strong reputation for ethical business practices and the success of our Hanes for Good corporate responsibility program for workplace practices and community and environmental improvement. The company is the only apparel producer to ever be honored by the Great Place to Work Institute for its workplace practices in Central America and the Caribbean. In the United States, the company has earned the Forbes magazine Best Place to Work honor. Hanes has won U.S. Environmental Protection Agency Energy Star sustained excellence recognition for seven consecutive years. Hanes has significant goals for reducing energy use, carbon emissions and water use and publicly reports its progress each year. More information about our Hanes for Good corporate responsibility initiatives may be found at www.HanesForGood.com

- We only accept payment via US PayPal accounts. PayPal allows you to pay using a major credit card or direct transfer from your bank accounts.

Why Buyfaire?


We are determined to deliver excellent customer service, great products and overall an amazing online shopping experience. Our products are backed by a 100% satisfaction guarantee. We accept PayPal and all major credit cards as a form of payment.


In case of any problems or questions, please feel free to contact us and we'll doour best to resolve any issues to your satisfaction.




























Shipping






All orders are shipped the same day or within 1 business day after receipt of cleared payment. We do not ship on weekends and US national holidays. Orders received and paid for on Friday will be shipped the following Monday.


USA


Domestic orders are sent via USPS, FedEx or UPS at our discretion. Once a parcel has been shipped, estimated transit time is 2-5 business days within the continental US. Please, submit orders in advance before the required delivery date.


International


International orders are sent via standard economy mail that is inexpensive and reliable, but not as fast as expedited or express mail. Keep in mind, that there is no guaranteed delivery date with standard economy mail. Estimated delivery dates shown on eBay suggest average shipping times to your country and should be used as an estimate only. Actual shipping times may vary.
 
Buyers are responsible for paying all import duties, taxes, and customs clearance fees.

RETURN POLICY
We accept returns within 30 days of purchase. Please submit a return request through your eBay dashboard and you will be provided with the proper return label.
BEST OFFERS
 

 If Best Offer is available, you will find a button under Buy It Now. Many of our listings are already marked at the lowest available price, and will not have the Best Offer feature in place. 

If you are purchasing only one item, please take into account that we must cover our costs, which includes the item, shipping and handling, and eBay and PayPal fees. We are more than happy to consider all offers, but please make sure it is a fair price on both ends. If you are sending a BEST OFFER and then decide to BUY IT NOW instead, please cancel your offer to avoid confusion and double charging.

 
PAYMENT
We only accept PayPal and we are required to collect sales tax on all purchases shipped to Georgia.  If you make an offer and it is accepted please make payment within 24 hours of purchase.
SHIPPING
 
We only ship to the United States, specifically the 48 contiguous states: we do not ship to Alaska, Hawaii, or Puerto Rico. We do not ship to APO/FPO and prefer a physical address rather than a P.O. Box, as our larger packages are sent via Fedex/UPS. All orders are shipped the same day that payment clears, or next day if it is after 4 p.m. EST. FEEDBACK

CONTACT US
